title: Celestial Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant - A Modern Take on Tradition
materials: 18K Rose Gold with Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Excellent quality diamonds with VVS clarity. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and durability.
features: Intricate filigree design with a teardrop diamond lattice pattern. Contemporary take on the classic Addaigai, perfect for the modern Telugu bride. Each diamond is meticulously set to maximize brilliance and sparkle. The 'L' shaped hooks are studded with diamonds, a subtle blend of tradition and modern design. A lightweight construction for comfortable everyday wear.
colors: Rose Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds
occasions: cocktail parties. Can also be worn for smaller family functions or as a stylish addition to your office attire.
description: This Mangalsutra pendant combines the sacred symbolism of marriage with a contemporary design, making it a versatile piece for the modern woman. The exquisite diamond setting and high-quality rose gold ensure enduring beauty and lasting value. A truly unique and cherished heirloom.
